resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102852</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102852</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206323</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Fight in the Fields: Cesar Chavez and the Farmworkers Struggle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Kampf in Fängt auf: Cesar 
Chavez und der Landarbeiter-Kampf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le combat dans les domaines : Cesar 
Chavez et la lutte d'agriculteurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A luta nos campos: Cesar Chavez e o esforço
dos empregados de fazenda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La lotta nei campi: Cesar Chavez e la lotta 
degli agricoltori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πάλη στα πεδία: Cesar Chavez και η 
farmworkers προσπάθεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La lucha en los campos: Cesar Chavez y la 
lucha de los agricultores</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">tells the story of a man, a union, and a time when millions of Americans joined a just cause. The Fight in the Fields is a portrait of Cesar Chavez, the charismatic leader of the United Farmworkers Union (UFW), and the history and impact of the UFW.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erklärt die Geschichte eines Mannes, des 
Anschlußes und der Zeit, als Millionen Amerikaner eine gerechte 
Ursache verbanden. Der Kampf in Fängt ist ein Portrait
von Cesar Chavez, der charismatische Führer des vereinigten 
Landarbeiter-Anschlußes (UFW) und der Geschichte und der Auswirkung 
des UFW auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dit l'histoire d'un homme, d'une union, et d'un 
moment où les millions d'Américains ont joint une cause juste. 
Le combat dans les domaines est une verticale de Cesar 
Chavez, l'amorce charismatique de l'union unie d'agriculteurs 
(UFW), et l'histoire et l'impact de l'UFW.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diz a história de um homem, de uma união, e de 
uma época em que os milhões dos americanos juntarem uma causa justa.
A luta nos campos é um retrato de Cesar Chavez, líder 
charismatic da união unida dos empregados de fazenda (UFW), e o 
history e o impacto do UFW.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dice alla storia di un uomo, di un'unione e di un 
periodo in cui milioni di Americani hanno unito una causa giusta. 
La lotta nei campi è un ritratto di Cesar Chavez, il 
capo charismatic dell'unione unita degli agricoltori (UFW) e la
storia e l'effetto del UFW.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λέει την ιστορία ενός ατόμου, μιας ένωσης, και ενός 
χρόνου όταν ένωσαν τα εκατομμύρια Αμερικανών μια δίκαιη αιτία. 
Η πάλη στα πεδία είναι ένα πορτρέτο Cesar Chavez, ο 
χαρισματικός ηγέτης της ενωμένης farmworkers ένωσης (UFW), 
και της ιστορίας και του αντίκτυπου του UFW.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuenta la historia de un hombre, de una unión, y 
de una época en que millones de americanos ensamblaron una causa 
justa. La lucha en los campos es un retrato de Cesar Chavez, el 
arranque de cinta carismático de la unión unida de los agricultores 
(UFW), y la historia y el impacto del UFW.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206323</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102852</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-fight-in-the-fields-cesar-chavez-and-the-farmworkers-struggle</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
